title: Lauren Goodger shops and reveals her phone screensaver
text:
Lauren Goodger went for the casual look on Wednesday evening as she hit the supermarket for groceries.

The reality star, 33, wore a light grey sweater brandished with a white Nike tick over a pair of very tight black Adidas leggings, which hugged her pert derrière.

She completed the ensemble with casual sports shoes, her shades resting on her head as she made her round around the store.

Lauren Goodger went for the casual look on Wednesday evening as she hit the supermarket for groceries

Despite the relaxed get-up, Lauren was sure to step out with a full face of make-up, including a wash of foundation, mascara and exquisitely detailed eyebrows.

She swept her brunette locks back into a loose up 'do for the errands.

The former The Only Way Is Essex starlet flashed her phone screensaver as ambled around the aisles - which featured a snap of herself.

Lauren was seen in the image, posing in a bikini, on the sun-drenched deck of a boat, somewhere far more exotic than Epping Forest.

Figure-hugging: The reality star, 33, wore a pair of very tight black Adidas leggings, which hugged her pert derrière

Wallpaper: Her phone screensaver featured a snap of herself. Lauren was seen in the image, posing in a bikini, on the sun-drenched deck of a boat, somewhere far more exotic than Epping Forest

Browsing: She wore a light grey sweater brandished with a white Nike tick

Decisions decisions: The former The Only Way Is Essex starlet ambled around the aisles

Checking out: She lined up to pay for her shopping

The outing comes after it emerged that her jailbird ex Jake McLean has been on dates with her friend and TOWIE co-star Yazmin Oukhellou.

Yazmin's representative confirmed the news to MailOnline, stating: 'It has been reported in the press today that following her break-up with James Lock two months ago, our client Yazmin Oukhellou is now dating Jake McLean.

'In order to clarify the facts on all related stories to this, Yazmin has decided to confirm that she is not dating this individual.

Incognito: She wore her shades resting on her head as she made her way around the store

Stepping out: She completed the ensemble with casual sports shoes

Shop til you drop: Despite the relaxed get-up, Lauren was sure to step out with a full face of make-up

All made up: She wore a wash of foundation, mascara and exquisitely detailed eyebrows

Weekly shop: She swept her brunette locks back into a loose up 'do for the errands

Rumours: The outing comes after it emerged that her jailbird ex Jake McLean has been on dates with her friend and TOWIE co-star Yazmin Oukhellou

Yazmin's representative confirmed the news to MailOnline, stating: 'It has been reported in the press today that following her break-up with James Lock two months ago, our client Yazmin Oukhellou is now dating Jake McLean'

They added: 'In order to clarify the facts on all related stories to this, Yazmin has decided to confirm that she is not dating this individual'

'Being an always honest and genuine person however, Yazmin validates that the pair have been on a couple of dates, but things seem to have fizzled out.

'Yazmin maintains firmly that her relationship status is single, and continues to focus on her upcoming work commitments.

'Yazmin maintains firmly that her relationship status is single, and continues to focus on her upcoming work commitments.'

They went on: 'Being an always honest and genuine person however, Yazmin validates that the pair have been on a couple of dates, but things seem to have fizzled out'

They concluded: 'Yazmin maintains firmly that her relationship status is single, and continues to focus on her upcoming work commitments'

History: Yazmin's close pal and former co-star, Lauren, previously dated Jake for four years between 2012 and 2016

Errands: Jake, who was 18 at the time, was jailed for three-and-a-half years after conning his way into a mother's house two days before Christmas in 2006, overpowering her before a masked gang ran in and raided the family home

Stocking up: Lauren's jailbird ex was part of vicious criminal gang and it is believed he only served half of his sentence, he is since said to have fathered a child with another woman

Yazmin's close pal and former co-star, Lauren, previously dated Jake for four years between 2012 and 2016.

Jake, who was 18 at the time, was jailed for three-and-a-half years after conning his way into a mother's house two days before Christmas in 2006, overpowering her before a masked gang ran in and raided the family home.

Lauren's jailbird ex was part of vicious criminal gang and it is believed he only served half of his sentence, he is since said to have fathered a child with another woman.

It's been quite the few days for Lauren, who was forced to hit back at claims she is dating Katie Price's ex Kris Boyson after they were pictured on a boozy night out together.

In the news: It's been quite the few days for Lauren, who was forced to hit back at claims she is dating Katie Price's ex Kris Boyson after they were pictured on a boozy night out together

Denial: Lauren insisted everything between them was platonic, announcing - 'There's no way I'd date anyone's sloppy seconds'

Days before: She was also accused of selling a counterfeit bag after eagle-eyed fans noticed she had changed the description from 'black Chanel replica handbag' to 'black Chanel handbag' on her Lauren Goodger Wardrobe Instagram page

Lauren insisted everything between them was platonic, announcing:'There's no way I'd date anyone's sloppy seconds.'

Days before that she was accused of selling a counterfeit bag after eagle-eyed fans noticed she had changed the description from 'black Chanel replica handbag' to 'black Chanel handbag' on her Lauren Goodger Wardrobe Instagram page.

The Chanel Grand Shopping Tote can fetch up to as much as £2,500 if sold second hand and Lauren's omission of the word 'replica' has prompted followers to question the authenticity of the slew of designer goods listed for sale.
description: Lauren Goodger went for the casual look on Wednesday evening as she hit the supermarket for groceries.
